animeDescription: 13 scientists seek to tap genetic powers by creating a hybrid of man and beast. Years later, 13 of their children are embroiled in a battle to undo their handiwork, while Shinichi, the son of one of the scientists, teams up with Christian super-beings to save the world.  (Source: Animevice)
animeStaff: [['Ooga Shunji', ['Director']], ['Ishikawa Ken', ['Original Creator']], ['Satou Keiichi', ['Animation Director']], ['Yamane Masahiro', ['Key Animation']]]
